amendment.description: To create a point of order against a provision in legislation that would increase the number of justices on the Supreme Court of the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 66 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 66 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 36.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 66.

Amendment SA 66 proposed by Senator Cotton. (consideration: CR S448-449; text: CR S448) To create a point of order against a provision in legislation that would increase the number of justices on the Supreme Court of the United States.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 66 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 36.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 66 proposed by Senator Cotton.
